casebody.data:
The PEOPLE, etc., Respondent,
v.
Steven BERREZUETA, Appellant. Motion No: 2017-1120 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 12, 2017

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Robert S. Dean, Esq., Center for Appellate Litigation, 120 Wall Street, 28th *1181**202Floor, New York, NY 10005 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
